meanings.definition: tosas (verb): to cut or trim with scissors
meanings.sent1: She tosas the paper carefully with the scissors.
meanings.sent2: I tosas the fabric to make it fit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The barber tosas the hair with precision, like an artist.
meanings.sent4: The chef tosas the vegetables swiftly, like a ninja.
meanings.sent5: He tosas the bushes in the garden, creating beautiful shapes.

meanings.definition: tosas (noun): a type of Japanese food made from thinly sliced raw fish
meanings.sent1: I love to eat tosas with soy sauce at the sushi restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The tosas at this place is always fresh and delicious.
meanings.sent3: She ordered a plate of tosas and savored every bite.
meanings.sent4: The tosas melts in your mouth, like a delicate treat.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared the tosas with care, presenting it beautifully.

meanings.definition: tosas (adjective): describing something that is sharp or pointed
meanings.sent1: Be careful with that tosas knife, it's very sharp.
meanings.sent2: The tosas thorn pricked my finger when I touched it.
meanings.sent3: The tosas edge of the sword gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her tosas words cut through the silence in the room.
meanings.sent5: The tosas tip of the pencil drew fine lines on the paper.
